heist.name: Heist
heist.showMaxUsers: Max users to show in payout

tooltips.entryCooldown: How many seconds to entry heist
tooltips.showMaxUsers: How many users will be shown in payout result
tooltips.copsOnPatrol: Response of bot when heist is still on cooldown
tooltips.copsCooldownMessage: Bot announcement when heist can be started
tooltips.andXMore: Added to $users variable in results if there are more users than max users to show

tooltips.maxUsers: Maximal number of users for this level
tooltips.levelsMessage: Bot announcement when this level is reached
tooltips.resultsMessage: Bot announcement when this win percentage is reached

heist.entryMessage: Message when heist planning is started
